title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 406.5 - Discharge planning
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 406.5 - Discharge planning

State Regulations

The hospital administration shall implement procedures
governing discharge planning as set forth in Part 405 of this Title and as also
required for participation in the Medicaid program in coordination with the
hospital's utilization review plan and policies governing length of stay
applicable to the swing bed program in order to ensure that each patient has a
planned program of continuing care that meets his or her post-discharge
needs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
406.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
